thread.title: Monday Night Football: How to watch Lions at Seahawks
thread.title_full: Monday Night Football: How to watch Lions at Seahawks | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: reviewjournal.com
title: Monday Night Football: How to watch Lions at Seahawks
text:
The Detroit Lions (0-3) will be looking for their first win of the season when they visit the Seattle Seahawks (1-2) at CenturyLink Field for Monday Night Football. Here's how you can catch the game.
Time: 5:30 p.m. PDT
TV: ESPN
Online: NFL Game Pass
If you're not able to catch the game at home on TV or listen live on NFL Game Pass, you can always head down to one of the NFL Bars or sports bars around the valley .
